name: Math Quiz (hassan mtayrek)
description:
Are you good in math?

Challenge your self and train your brain to solve the simple math quiz.

Math Quiz is a game that test your knowledge with the basic math. This game includes Addition, Subtraction, Multiplication, Division, also it contains a test that is mixed with all of the above.

A simple equation will be shown and four answers will be write down, select the write answer, but be careful the clock is running.

Is game is made for training the mind to solve a simple math equation in less than five seconds.
